project_name.justification: The project is consistently referred to as the 'Kay Mine Project' or 'Kay Mine Deposit' throughout the documents. For example: 'Arizona Metals Corp to Acquire Additional Private Lands at its Kay Mine Project'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence of the press releases: 'Arizona Metals Corp. (TSX: AMC) (OTCQX: AZMCF) (the "Company" or "Arizona Metals") is pleased to announce...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is quoted in the text: 'Marc Pais, CEO of Arizona Metals comments, "The acquisition of the Property is another significant de-risking step..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The company acquired a 100% interest in the land parcels across multiple transactions. '...to acquire 100% of a private land parcel...' and '...completed the acquisition of 100% of an Arizona State Land parcel...'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata lists Au as the primary commodity, and the text supports this by describing the project's potential as a 'copper-gold-zinc-silver' mine.

verified_article_link.justification: No article URL was provided in the source documents to verify.

currency.justification: The currency for the payments is explicitly stated as US dollars. 'The Purchase Agreement to acquire the Property calls for total payments of US$2,500,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: This value is the sum of two separate cash acquisitions for the Kay project: US$2,500,000 and US$366,100. 'The Purchase Agreement to acquire the Property calls for total payments of US$2,500,000...' and 'The Company will make total payments of US$366,100 to the State of Arizona...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms described in the documents are for cash payments only. There is no mention of share payments.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The payment terms were explicitly broken down as cash payments, so this combined field is not applicable per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the land acquisition transactions.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transactions, so there is no applicable share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The documents do not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The documents do not mention any monetary commitment for exploration as part of the acquisition terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No royalty was acquired or retained as part of the transactions. The text notes the main property is 'not subject to any royalties'.

coverage_area_raw.justification: This is the sum of two separate land acquisitions: one for 46.4 acres and another for 40 acres. '...a private land parcel totaling 46.4 acres...' and '...an Arizona State Land parcel totaling 40 acres...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the acquired land is specified as acres. '...a private land parcel totaling 46.4 acres...'

resource_size.justification: The text mentions a historic estimate but explicitly states it is not a current resource, which per the rules requires a null value. 'The Kay Mine historic estimate has not been verified as a current mineral resource... A Qualified Person has not done sufficient work to classify it as a current mineral resource, and Arizona Metals is not treating the historic estimate as a current mineral resource.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph of the press releases: 'Arizona Metals Corp. (TSX: AMC)'.
